register.title: Register to participate in our courses
register.subtitle: Would you like to speak with one of our consultants? Just enter your details and we’ll contact you soon. You can also email us if you prefer.

home.start_subtitle: Structured courses from beginner to professional level.

features.title: Professional and Practical Approach
features.description: Courses are based on real accounting examples and workplace situations.

features.title: Certificate and Career Opportunities
features.description: Outstanding students receive certificates and job offers from partners.

features.title: Modern Teaching Methods
features.description: We use the latest digital tools to make learning more engaging and effective.

features.title: Post-course Support
features.description: We provide ongoing consultation and career guidance even after course completion.

features.title: For Beginners and Professionals
features.description: Programs are suitable for both newcomers and experienced professionals.

aboutPage.who_we_are_text: Welcome to ADC Training Center.  Our goal is to provide participants with up-to-date knowledge in the accounting field. The courses are designed for both beginners and practicing accountants. The course also introduces participants to Armenia's leading and most in-demand 1C Accounting 7 software.
target_list: Those who have no prior knowledge in accounting and want to acquire an accounting profession
Those who want to improve their accounting knowledge and skills for practical work
Organizations wishing their employees to gain modern knowledge and become more professional
Management personnel or individual entrepreneurs who want to manage accounting independently
Our goal is to help you acquire one of the most in-demand and high-paying professions today

faq.question: What courses do you offer?
answer: Financial Accounting
Tax and Labor Legislation
Electronic system for report submission and issuing accounting documents
1C Accounting 7 software

faq.question: Who can participate in the courses?
answer: Those who have no prior knowledge in accounting and want to acquire an accounting profession
Those who want to improve their accounting knowledge and skills for practical work
Organizations wishing their employees to gain modern knowledge and become more professional
Management personnel or individual entrepreneurs who want to manage accounting independently

faq.question: Where are the courses conducted?
answer: Courses are conducted at Davit Anhaght 11/6, Gegharkunik region, Vardenik village, Armenia
Online via Zoom / Google Meet / MS Teams
Hybrid format depending on participants' preference

faq.question: Is a certificate awarded after completion?
answer: Participants who successfully complete the course receive a certificate. Outstanding students get the opportunity to work in partner organizations.

faq.question: What is the duration of the courses?
answer: The total course duration is 5 months, 40 classes.
Courses are held twice a week for 2.5 hours each session.
We also have day and evening groups:
Day group: 13:30 - 16:00
Evening group: 18:00 - 20:30

faq.question: How can I register?
answer: Contact us by phone or email
Visit our office
Online via our website or Facebook/Instagram pages

faq.question: Are intensive courses available?
answer: Yes! We regularly organize intensive seminars lasting 1-2 weeks for participants with limited time.

faq.question: Who are the instructors?
answer: Our instructors are experienced professionals — certified accountants, tax consultants, and financial analysts.

faq.question: Do the courses include practical work and internship opportunities?
answer: Yes! Our courses include many practical examples, real document work, and accounting software usage. Outstanding students may join free internships in partner organizations.

about.title: About the Course
about.text: The goal of the Financial Accounting course is to provide participants with foundational knowledge of accounting and finance. Upon completion, students will be ready to work in financial and accounting departments of various organizations.

willLearn.title: During the course, you will:
list: Learn the basic principles and methodology of accounting.
Recognize accounting documents and perform primary bookkeeping for real transactions.
Prepare and analyze basic financial statements using acquired knowledge.

forWhom.title: Who is this course for:
list: Those with no prior accounting knowledge who wish to become accountants.
Those who want to enhance their accounting skills for practical work.
Companies that want their employees to receive up-to-date, professional training.
Business owners and entrepreneurs who want to manage their own accounting.
University students and graduates.

advantages.title: Advantages:
list: Participants successfully completing the course receive a certificate.
Real accounting knowledge gained through practical exercises and real-world examples.
Internship opportunities at partner organizations for top students.
Professional and experienced instructors.

about.title: About the Course
about.text: The goal of the 'Armenian Accounting Program' course is to provide participants with practical knowledge of the HSoft accounting software, allowing them to confidently work with one of the most widely used accounting systems in Armenia.

willLearn.title: During the course, you will learn to:
list: Understand the logic and structure of the HSoft accounting system
Enter documents and perform various types of transactions
Generate reports on turnover, balances, and statements
Handle salary calculations, payments, and reporting procedures
Efficiently use the program to automate accounting workflows

forWhom.title: Who is this course for?
list: Beginner accountants who want to gain practical experience
Active professionals seeking to enhance or refresh their skills
Company managers and finance department staff who want to manage accounting independently
University students and recent graduates

about.title: About the Course
about.text: The Tax Legislation course aims to familiarize participants with Armenia's tax system, tax rates, calculation rules, and tax reporting, combining theoretical knowledge with practical real-world tasks.

details.schedule: Classes are held twice a week, evening group: 18:30-21:00

willLearn.title: During the course, you will learn to:
list: Understand the structure of the tax system and functions of tax authorities
Master the main provisions of tax legislation and their application principles
Get familiar with main taxes in Armenia: profit tax, income tax, VAT, turnover tax, etc.
Prepare tax reports and manage deadlines
Learn to calculate taxes for different legal forms (SP, LLC, etc.)
Understand penalties for violations of tax law
Gain a comprehensive understanding of the Armenian tax system
Correctly apply tax legislation

forWhom.title: Who is this course for?
list: Accountants and finance specialists
Economists and tax consultants
Company managers and finance department staff
Lawyers working in finance and taxation
University students and graduates

advantages.title: Advantages
list: Participants who successfully complete the course receive a certificate
Acquire real accounting knowledge with practical examples, calculations, and common work situations
Opportunity for internship at partner organizations for top students
Professional and experienced teaching staff

about.title: About Training
about.text: ADC Training Academy also provides employee training according to modern requirements, allowing staff to become more professional in their work.

forWhom.title: Who is this for?
list: Organizations seeking to have more professional employees
Finance managers who want their staff to be more professional but cannot train them due to time constraints
Employees who want to gain practical, up-to-date knowledge to improve their skills

advantages.title: Advantages
list: Participants who successfully complete the course receive a certificate
Acquire real accounting knowledge with practical examples and calculations
Professional and experienced teaching staff
